name: .IC File Extension
summary: Learn about .IC files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open IC files with Infinite Craft by uploading them via a web browser. To open an IC file, select Menu, and then click Upload in the save slot in which you want to open the IC file.
Infinibrowser Save File Analyzer also allows you to open IC files. It is an online tool that runs in a web browser.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

images.alt: Screenshot of a .ic file in Infinite Craft
images.caption: IC file open in Infinite Craft
